item.description:
Mandarin Conversation group Meetup.

We will be going out for dinner that night instead to The taiwan Cafe. BCNC is closed for columbus day. Please update your rsvp accordingly. Sorry for those who were really excited to meet and practice Chinese. You can still practice your Chinese or English while eating dinner together.

If you really want to practice chinese or english you can go to the Wednesday Meet up too or instead this coming Wednesday.


Price: we will be ordering and sharing and dividing the cost up evenly. Not expensive restaurant. great Taiwan cuisine.


Hope you can make it!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
